**The Writs of Jade Talismans for Upper Clarity**

**Title:** *The Writs of Jade Talismans for Upper Clarity*
Author unknown, likely composed between the Tang and Song dynasties. According to the *Song History: Treatise on Arts and Letters*, the original text comprised five scrolls, later divided into five works: *The Writs of the Azure Tallies for Upper Clarity*, *The Writs of the White Tallies*, *The Crimson Spring Writs*, *The Writs of the Black Tallies*, and *The Writs of the Yellow Tallies*. Here, they are presented as one. The base text is from the *Daoist Canon of the Zhengtong Era*, under the Jade Writs section of the Cavern Mystery Division.

---

### **The Writs of the Azure Tallies for Upper Clarity**

**The Primordial Record of the Nine Heavens’ True Writs, Inscribed by the Originator to Examine the Earth**
The Three Origins’ Mystic Terrace Jade Tallies and Purple Writs—also called *The Primordial Record of the Nine Heavens’ True Writs, Inscribed by the Originator to Examine the Earth*, or *The Three Origins’ Tiger Writs*, or *The Flying Heavenly Perfected’s Proclamation to the Essences of the Six Heavens and Myriad Spirits*—govern mountains and rivers, inspect the spirits of the Nine Lands, and command ninety Jade Maidens. Through this, one may welcome the Sagely Lord in the Palace of Upper Clarity during the Great Peace. The recipient must transcribe it with a yellow brush upon azure silk and offer it in sacrifice at the sacred peak of their natal destiny. They shall then wear it for nine years. If they have not yet ascended to heaven, they must transcribe another copy, burn it, and scatter the ashes into the azure mist of the clouds. They shall transcribe yet another copy and bury it at the sacred peak of their natal destiny, tread the sources of the rivers, govern the earth’s spirits, and command the myriad gods. After nine years, they will ride the chariot of the Three Origins and ascend to the Palace of the Three Origins. If one defiles it with impurity, offends the celestial perfected, or carelessly reveals its proclamations, their seven generations will bear blame, their body will perish, and they will lose immortality.
*From the* Scripture of the Three Origins’ Jade Tallies.

---

### **The Vermilion Writs of the Phoenix Script**

The Supreme Dao Lord addressed the Perfected of the Great Ultimate: "Though your rank has ascended to the Great Ultimate and you oversee the divine lineage, without the chapters of the Phoenix Script, you may not casually ascend to Jade Clarity or visit the Three Origins. I now impart this to you—diligently uphold it."

**The Nine-One Hidden Tones of the Jade Characters of the Phoenix’s Qi**
Those who wear it become divine immortals; those who practice it attain perfectedhood; those who revere it ward off calamities. If one maintains a perpetual fast, engages in ascetic practice, dwells in secluded heights, and recites it ten thousand times, they will spur dragons to drive the void and ascend to Jade Clarity.
*From the* Scripture of the Purple Phoenix and Vermilion Writs.

---

### **The Supreme Jade Dawn Banner for Commanding Demon-Spirits**

Those who wear it master the Great Demon-Spirit King of the Eastern Azure Emperor. The method requires entering a chamber at sunset, facing east, reciting the Azure Emperor’s hymn, and displaying the banner within the room, placing it in the east. It is inscribed in white upon azure silk.

---

### **The True Talisman of the Divine Tiger**

There is the True Talisman of the Divine Tiger, which subdues the Six Heavens and governs the spirits of heaven and earth, enabling the destruction of a thousand essences. When worn, all ghosts vanish, and no demon dares invade. Advancing while wearing it allows one to audience with the Jade Emperor; venerating it in one’s chamber summons the host of perfected to their abode.

---

### **The Supreme Talisman of the Divine Tiger**

Wearing this talisman allows one to traverse perilous passes, cross mountains and seas, summon spirits, command ghosts, and bestow seals upon sacred peaks. Wherever one goes, a thousand demons prostrate themselves, ten thousand spirits bind their forms, and a

### **The Supreme Talisman of the Divine Tiger** *(continued)*

Inscribe in white upon azure silk and wear it upon the body; when traveling eastward, one shall summon the Great Peace of the World of Na Shan, where the Demon King of the Six Heavens will gird his sash, bow in reverence, and offer welcome. The immortals shall attend as guards, and upon entering Mount Tai, one shall be borne aloft by a canopy of azure clouds and, after nine years, ascend to the Upper Clarity.

*Recorded in the* **Hidden Writ of Jade Clarity**.

---

### **The Talisman of the Seven Luminaries and the Star of Pacification**

To summon the Perfected and immortals of the Central Marchmount, inscribe in vermilion upon yellow paper, face the Year-Star, and wear it. Cultivate with focused intent for a hundred days, and the immortals shall arrive at once; the Perfected shall visit your chamber to bestow the elixir of transcendence and the Five Elders’ sacred writ.

To subdue the demons of the Yellow Emperor, inscribe in azure upon a nine-inch yellow wooden tablet and place it above the Year-Star. After a hundred days, the celestial demons shall bind their forms, and the myriad spirits shall perish of themselves. The **Imperial August Script**, practiced for seven years, enables flight as an immortal.

*Recorded in the* **Scripture of the Seven Luminaries**.

---

### **The Hidden Writ of the Eastern Mons**

Inscribe with orpiment upon green silk and wear it upon the body; one may then wander the land of Ahaluoti in the east, subdue the host of spirits, behead celestial demons, tame the Five Weapons, and roam the famed mountains. The Hu Elders shall come to escort and welcome, and one shall naturally comprehend the tongues of the Six States, conversing with the gods as equals.

### **The Hidden Writ of Entry into the Six Lands**

Bestowed by the Most Exalted Lord of the Azure Lads, this writ comprises one hundred and eighty-five characters. Inscribe with orpiment upon green silk and wear it upon the body; a radiant halo shall emanate from the nape, illuminating the Ten Heavens. One may command thirty-six Jade Lads and thirty-six Jade Maidens, traverse the Five Marchmounts, cross the famed mountains, enter the Six Lands, tread the sources of the rivers, and wherever one goes, the immortals and officials of the Five Directions shall come to bow in reverence, while the border guardians shall welcome and escort. One shall overawe the Six Lands, subdue the Five Weapons, and transform without limit, following one’s will. Descending chariots of flying wheels and the Purple Carriage of the Cinnabar Empyrean shall come to welcome one’s ascent to the Azure Palace of Eastern Florescence.

When wearing this writ to traverse the Six Lands, tread the Five Marchmounts, and cross the famed mountains, upon reaching a border, first knock the teeth together thirty-six times, hold the breath for thirty-six cycles, and recite the incantation:

*"The Jade Perfected wander in circles,
Cloud chariots soar on high.
This day is most auspicious,
Dragons take flight, phoenixes soar.
Arrayed in feathered regalia,
The Four Paths open wide.
The Six Hosts begin their march,
The Ten Realms come to welcome.
Immortal lads bear the banners,
Jade maidens scatter incense.
The Five Elders bow in reverence,
Winged and soaring in formation.
Sun and moon intertwine as sashes,
Divine immortals come to escort.
Traversing the myriad lands,
Circling the four directions,
The Four Waterways and Five Marchmounts
Become my bridges and beams.
By the Emperor’s decree,
Sweep away all inauspiciousness.
All divine manifestations
Shall be most propitious.
A myriad wonders arise,
The immortal’s inner cultivation flourishes.
Foreign lands grow bright and clear,
Ascending to the Jade Capital."*

Upon completion, draw in the breath and swallow thirty-six times. This is the **Great Invocation of the Most Exalted Lord’s Wandering Might**. Practicing it subdues the Six Lands, tames the myriad spirits, summons the immortals to appear, and enables transformation without limit, ascending to the Great Clarity.

*Recorded in the* **Scripture of the Foreign Lands’ Emanations**.

---

### **The Jade Talisman of the Soaring Numinous Flight**

The **Script of the Dark Immortals and Feathered Essences**, a writ of spontaneity. Wearing it for seven years enables flight through the void, ascending to the Seven Luminaries.

On the day of ascent, inscribe it upon the left palm, grasp the Azure Radiance, and take flight. Alternatively, inscribe it upon a nine-inch green silk and wear it on the left; one shall command the Six Jia and the Twelve Spirits, with twelve Jade Maidens attending on the right.

---

### **The Talisman of the Sun Essence of the First Luminary**

Inscribe in vermilion upon white paper, face the direction of the current month’s station, and wear it. Cultivate with focused intent for a hundred days, and the Perfected shall descend to your chamber to converse with you.

To subdue demonic essences, inscribe in azure upon a nine-inch yellow wooden tablet and place it above the current month’s station. The celestial demons shall vanish of themselves, and the myriad spirits shall bind their forms. The **Imperial August Script** must not be recklessly divulged; keep it secret and practice it faithfully, and after ten years, one shall fly as an immortal.

---

### **The Talisman of the Year-Star Essence of the Three Luminaries**

Inscribe in black upon green paper, face east, and wear it. Cultivate with focused intent for a hundred days, and the immortals shall arrive at once; the Perfected shall visit your chamber to bestow the elixir of transcendence.

To subdue the demons of the Azure Emperor, inscribe in white upon a nine-inch green wooden tablet and place it facing east for a hundred days. The celestial demons shall bind their forms, and the myriad spirits shall perish of themselves. The **Imperial August Script** must be kept secret and practiced faithfully; after seven years, one shall fly as an immortal.

**The Talisman of the Azure Emperor for Summoning Spirits and Subduing Demons**

Wear this for eight years, and the Emperor shall descend in an eight-chariot procession to welcome your body, ascending to heaven in broad daylight. The secrets of the Nine Heavens must be treasured and kept confidential; cultivate its Way, and the Dao shall descend without fail, immortality shall be attained without exception. Inscribe in black upon a green tablet, nine inches in width and twelve inches in length, and place it facing east within your chamber while cultivating and reciting the scripture.

*From the* **Scripture of the Golden Perfected and Jade Radiance**.

---

**The Black Emperor’s Talisman of Ren and Gui for Communing with Spirits**

Inscribe in black upon green silk and wear it on your person. On Ren or Gui days, inscribe in black upon green paper, face north, and ingest one talisman. After three years of Ren and Gui, the Jade Maiden of the Great Mystery shall descend and appear, your body shall commune with spirits, and you shall know all affairs within ten thousand *li* of the northern direction. The immortal officials of the Northern Peak shall present the natural alchemical kitchen. After nine years, the Black Emperor shall descend to your bedchamber, welcoming you with a black mist and a flying chariot to ascend to the Supreme Clarity Palace.

*From the* **Scripture of the Six Jia of the Numinous Flight**.

---

**The Correct Method of the Red Heaven’s Mysterious Yellow for Eliminating the Texts of the Six Heavens**

The qi of the Mysterious Yellow and Flying Mystery coalesces into jade script. Those who wear it shall unite with the Three Qi in perfection, rectify the Six Heavens, restrain qi, and subdue demons, beheading a thousand evils, wielding awe over the multitude of spirits, entering and exiting water and fire without harm from the myriad calamities.

*From the* **Scripture of the Correct Methods of the Three Heavens**.

---

**The Jade Clarity’s Single Green Wheel for Inspecting Treasures**

**The Hidden Script of Golden Mystery Inscribed by the Dragon Smoke of the Supreme**

The Nine Mysteries Lord of the Golden Palace of the Later Sage received this from the Linghuang of the High Prime. It was transmitted to the Minister of the Upper Prime, the Azure Youth. Inscribe in yellow upon a green tablet and place it in the southwest to extinguish the great demon king of the Yellow Emperor and his retinue, summoning the immortal officials of the Yellow Emperor from the World of Extended Blessings in the southwest. After nine years, the Eight Emperors and the Perfected Kings of the True Worth shall manifest in your body, bestowing upon you the elixir of flying immortality, refining and transforming your body through seventy-four transmutations.

Alternatively, inscribe in yellow upon green silk and wear it on your person. Travel to the World of Extended Blessings in the southwest, and the myriad spirits shall gird themselves in submission, while the demon kings shall bow their heads in reverence. The Three Primes shall descend in flying chariots of jade wheels to welcome you into the chambers of the Three Primes.

**The Hidden Script of Golden Mystery of the Jade Clarity’s Conch River, Evil Channel, and the Dawn Mandate of the Initial Silence of the Merging Radiance of Heaven**

Received by the Great Emperor of Fusang from the Perfected King of the Great Empyrean. To practice the Way of divine transcendence, inscribe in yellow upon a dark green tablet and place it in the southeast to extinguish the great demon king of the Luminous Emperor and his retinue, summoning the immortal officials of the Luminous Emperor from the World of Worthy Fields in the southeast. After fifteen years, twenty jade maidens shall be dispatched to serve you, gathering natural spiritual medicines.

Alternatively, inscribe in yellow upon green silk and wear it on your person. Travel to the World of Worthy Fields in the southeast, and the myriad spirits shall gird themselves in the east, while the demon kings shall bow their heads in reverence. You shall ride upon a green cloud and feathered canopy, flying to the Jade Clarity Palace.

---

**The Jade Script of the Northern Emperor for Annihilating Demons and Slaying Ghosts**

Received from the Supreme Three Heavens, guarded by twelve jade maidens of yellow silk, one named *Spirit-Extinguishing Numinous Strategy*, worn by the Lord of the Supreme Jade Emperor. To slay ghosts on Wu or Ji days, inscribe in white upon green silk, twelve inches in length and three inches and two *fen* in width. On Wu days, place it upon Jia in the east; on Ji days, place it upon Yi. Hold your breath for nine exhalations, knock your left teeth thirty-six times, and recite the incantation:

*"Within the Yellow Center, the mandate is ordered;
The mandate governs the Nine Heavens.
The Three Numinous respond to the talisman,
The Five Elders verify the immortals.
Hasten the Northern Emperor to restrain
And deliver the demonic bodies.
The multitude of evils close their eyes,
Unable to delay or evade.
By the command of the Supreme Emperor,
Pursue and capture without mercy.
Should any dare to flee,
Swiftly bind them to Feng Mountain.
Bright as the Emperor’s trust,
Facing the Jade Dawn."*

Conclude by drawing in qi nine times and swallowing it. Practice this for nine days, and the demonic ghosts shall bind their forms and appear as shadows before you, submitting to your command. The myriad demons shall be extinguished at their roots, and the multitude of spirits shall lose their essence. Inscribe in white upon green silk and wear it on your person while traveling the world; the ten thousand ghosts shall flee in terror, and a thousand demons shall hide their traces, daring not to offend. After nine years, you shall naturally gain the service of seven jade maidens of pure spirit.

*This talisman is from the* **Hidden Scripture of Jade Clarity**.

---

**The Jade Token Methods of the Upper Clarity Conclude Here**

---

**The White Token Method of the Upper Clarity’s Talismans**

**The Nine Qi Talisman of Tai Shang Jia Yi Entering Wood**

Scholars ingest this talisman to summon its spirit, visualize its qi to descend its perfected essence, and seek to erase the tablets of the Water Emperor, inscribing their names upon the jade registers. In accordance with the scripture, visualize, recite, and invoke. After nine years of practice, you shall be able to inscribe talismans and cast them into mountains, causing mountains to send down clouds and rain. Inscribe upon wood, and though carved, the script shall not fade but grow ever brighter. Carry the talisman and embrace a tree, and your body shall become one with the mountain forests. Bury the talisman in the Eastern Peak, and the Eastern Peak shall guard you with twelve immortal officials. After eighteen years, you shall be able to fly to the Upper Clarity.

Recklessly divulging this Way shall incur punishment by ghostly soldiers, calamity extending to seven generations, and your body shall sink into the river’s source.

---

**The Three Qi Talisman of Tai Shang Bing Ding Entering Fire**

Scholars ingest this talisman to summon its spirit, visualize its qi to descend its perfected essence, erase the tablets of the Water Emperor, and inscribe their names upon the jade registers. In accordance with the scripture, visualize, recite, and invoke. After nine years of practice, you shall be able to inscribe talismans and cast them into forests, causing forests to spontaneously ignite; cast them into water, and water shall produce dragons; cast them into mountains, and mountains shall send down clouds and rain. Bury the talisman in the Southern Peak, and immortal officials shall attend and guard your body. After eighteen years, you shall be able to fly to the Jade Clarity.

Recklessly divulging this Way shall bring calamity upon seven generations, your body shall be consigned to the ghostly officials, and you shall be eternally confined to the earthly prisons, unable to ascend as an immortal.

---

**The Seven Qi Talisman of Tai Shang Geng Xin Entering Metal**

Scholars ingest this talisman to summon its spirit, visualize its qi to descend its perfected essence, erase the tablets of the Water Emperor, and inscribe their names upon the jade registers. In accordance with the scripture, cultivate, recite, and invoke. After nine years of practice, you shall be able to inscribe talismans upon stone, refining stone into gold; inscribe talismans and embrace stone, and the stone shall conceal your form. Bury the talisman in the Western Peak, and immortal officials shall descend to present natural and wondrous treasures.

After eighteen years of cultivation, you shall ascend through the void to the Jade Purity. Should you recklessly disclose this Way, divine soldiers shall mete out punishment, and your seven generations shall bear the burden of judgment.

**The Five Qi Talisman of Tai Shang Ren Gui Entering Water**
Scholars ingest this talisman to summon its spirit, visualize its qi to descend its perfected essence. Follow the original text in cultivation, recitation, and invocation. After nine years of practice, you shall inscribe talismans and cast them into water, whereupon dragons shall halt the flow and still the waves, and entering water shall be as traversing empty space. Bury the talisman in the Northern Peak, and immortal officials shall descend to bestow divine medicines and the formula of deathlessness. After eighteen years, you shall sit or stand at will, vanish and reappear, ride the void in flight, and ascend to the Jade Purity. This Way is lofty and wondrous; it is not transmitted to the untrue. Should you recklessly disclose its sacred writ, your seven generations shall bear the burden of judgment, your body shall be consigned to the ghostly officials, and you shall be eternally bound as a prisoner of the dark, unable to ascend as an immortal.

**The One Qi Talisman of Tai Shang Wu Ji Entering Earth**
Scholars ingest this talisman to summon its spirit, visualize its qi to descend its perfected essence, erase the tablets of the Water Emperor, and inscribe their names upon the jade registers. In accordance with the scripture, cultivate, recite, and invoke. After nine years of practice, you shall comprehend the languages of the thirty-six nations and perceive the forms and hues of the thirty-six Earth Sovereigns beneath the ten thousand abysses. Inscribe talismans and cast them into earth, and your form shall merge with the soil. Bury the talisman in the Central Peak, and immortal officials shall attend and guard you, bestowing the natural kitchens and the medicine of deathlessness. After eighteen years of practice, you shall traverse the mysterious void in flight and ascend to the Jade Capital. Guard this as the secret of immortals; should you recklessly disclose it, nine generations shall bear the burden of judgment, your body shall endure the three paths of suffering, and you shall be consigned to the dark mountains as a prisoner.

**The Nine Springs Azure Qi Talisman**
On the day of the Beginning of Spring or the Spring Equinox at dawn, write in cinnabar upon green paper, face east, and ingest it. In accordance with the scripture, visualize: the Spirit King of the Eastern Sea shall erase my death tablets and inscribe my name in the immortal registers. After reciting the invocation as prescribed, cast the talisman into the abyss of eastward-flowing waters. After eighteen years of practice, the Water Emperor shall inscribe your name in the Jade Purity and send down dragon chariots, enabling you to traverse the great void in flight.

**The Cavernous Origin Crimson Qi Talisman**
On the day of the Beginning of Summer or the Summer Solstice at noon, write in cinnabar upon green paper, face south, and ingest it. Follow the text in visualization: the Spirit King of the Southern Sea shall erase my sin tablets and inscribe my name in the immortal registers. After reciting the invocation as prescribed, cast the talisman into the abyss of southward-flowing waters. After eighteen years of practice, the Spirit King shall list your name before the Jade Emperor and send down cloud-dragon cinnabar carriages, enabling you to traverse the great void in flight.

**The Cavernous Abyss White Qi Talisman**
On the day of the Beginning of Autumn or the Autumn Equinox at dusk, write in cinnabar upon green paper, face west, and ingest it. Perform the visualization: the Spirit King of the Western Sea shall erase my sin tablets, inscribe my name in the immortal registers, and present it before the Jade Emperor. After reciting the invocation as prescribed, cast the talisman into the abyss of westward-flowing waters. After eighteen years of practice, the Sea Spirits shall welcome and escort you, unrestrained by water or bridges, and send down dragon carriages, enabling you to traverse the great void in flight.

**The Cavernous River Black Qi Talisman**
On the day of the Beginning of Winter or the Winter Solstice at midnight, write in cinnabar upon green paper, face north, and ingest it. In accordance with the scripture, visualize: the Spirit King of the Northern Sea shall erase my sin tablets and inscribe my name in the jade registers. After reciting the invocation as prescribed, cast the talisman into the abyss of northward-flowing waters. After eighteen years of practice, you shall command the Water Spirits to assemble the twelve dragons to channel water and summon rain, darkening the bright day, and traverse the empty void in flight.

These nine talismans derive from the *Scripture of the Nine Crimson Talismans*.

**The Talisman of Tai Shang’s Three Ascents to Fangzhang and the Thunderous Spirit**
Those who guard the feminine unity and practice the Great Cavern Way shall constantly wear this talisman over the heart, written in cinnabar of any size as desired. It may be worn while sitting or lying down, or placed within bedding. When worn, it repels evil for four inches around the body; when sat upon, it repels evil for three feet. Wearing this talisman grants longevity and deathlessness, enables the command of ghosts and spirits, and ensures that the Great Demon King of the Northern Emperor dares not test you.

This derives from the *Perfect Scripture of the Great Cavern*.

**The Treasured Writ of Tai Shang**

The Scripture states: Wear it for eight years, and the Three Ones shall all manifest. Write in cinnabar on plain silk and wear it on the left elbow. The Azure Lad bestowed this upon Juanzi to seal the sacred mountains. This derives from the *Perfect Scripture of the Four Palaces’ Feminine Unity*.

**The True Talisman of the Golden Tiger**
The True Talisman of the Golden Tiger commands the spirits of Heaven and Earth, enabling the crushing of a thousand essences and the subjugation of ten thousand ghosts. When worn while advancing, one may ascend to pay homage to the Jade Emperor; when placed by one’s bed, all perfected beings shall visit the chamber. Those who wear this talisman wield authority over Heaven and Earth, rebuke the assembled spirits, ride dragons through the clouds, and hold office as exalted immortals. Once its jade-like resonance resounds, jade blossoms attend at one’s side, golden perfected ones guard as soldiers, a thousand demons lose their sight, and ten thousand ghosts vanish in form. This derives from the *Hidden Writ of the Supreme Eight Guards*.

**The Talisman for Enduring the Great Kalpa, Preserving Life, and Ensuring Longevity**
The essence of the Primordial Nine Mysteries, passing through the great yang’s nine conjunctions, when the floodwaters drowned the heavens. Write in blue-green on white silk and wear it upon the head; one shall float upon the clear waves, no calamity able to harm, preserving the body’s longevity. With long wear, one becomes an immortal.

**The Talisman for Enduring the Lesser Kalpa, Preserving Life, and Ensuring Longevity**
The True Talisman of the Nine Heavens, passing through the lesser yang’s nine cycles, when water disasters raged and ten thousand calamities arose together. Write in cinnabar on white silk and wear it on the left elbow; one shall not sink in the abyss nor burn in fire, no calamity able to harm, preserving the body’s long life. With long wear, one’s lifespan equals Heaven’s, and one becomes an immortal.

**The Talisman for Enduring the Great Hundred and Six Calamities, Preserving Life, and Ensuring Longevity**
The Jade Talisman of the Supreme Sovereign, passing through the great hundred and six calamities. Write in cinnabar on white silk and wear it upon the head; flowing disasters and violent calamities cannot harm, preserving the body’s long life, with a lifespan equal to the Three Luminaries. Wear it for nine years, and one shall ascend to the Great Clarity in broad daylight.

**The Talisman for Enduring the Lesser Hundred and Six Calamities, Preserving Life, and Ensuring Longevity**
The Supreme Purple Void Jade Talisman, passing through the lesser hundred and six calamities. Write in yellow on white silk and wear it on the left elbow; a thousand demons and ten thousand essences, epidemics raging and disasters flowing, cannot harm, preserving the body’s long life, with a lifespan equal to Heaven and Earth. Wear it for nine years, and one shall ascend in broad daylight.

**The Talisman for Enduring the Yin-Yang Transition, Preserving Life, and Ensuring Longevity**
The Jade Talisman of the Three Heavenly Lads, passing through the transformation of Heaven and Earth, when ten thousand epidemics raged together, water and fire, weapons and illness, a thousand disasters advancing in unison. Write in black on white silk and wear it; one’s lifespan equals Heaven’s years, one’s radiance equals the sun’s light. After nine years of flight, one ascends to the Great Clarity. These five talismans above all derive from the *Supreme Scripture of the Purple Writ*.

**The Yellow Emperor’s Wuji Talisman for Communicating with Spirits**
Write in yellow on white silk and wear it on the body. On a Wuji day, write in yellow on white paper and face the Grand Year Star to ingest one piece. After three years, the Jade Maiden of the Yellow Essence shall descend and appear; one’s body shall attain spiritual communication, knowing the affairs of the central ten thousand miles, and the immortal officials of the Central Marchmount shall send forth the natural kitchen. After nine years, the Yellow Emperor shall descend to one’s bedchamber, welcoming one with a flying chariot of yellow mist to ascend to the Supreme Clarity Palace.

**The Vermilion Talisman of the Jiazi Plain Petition**
Write in cinnabar on white silk and wear it. On a Jiazi day at dawn, write in cinnabar on white paper, face east to ingest it, and visualize with focused intent the Straight-Armored Jade Maiden holding the talisman before you.

**The Vermilion Talisman of the Jiawu Plain Petition**
Write in cinnabar on white silk and wear it. On a Jiawu day at dawn, write in cinnabar on white paper, face east to ingest it, and visualize with focused intent the Straight-Armored Jade Maiden holding the talisman before you.

**The Vermilion Talisman of the Jiachen Plain Petition**
Write in cinnabar on white silk and wear it. On a Jiachen day at dawn, write in cinnabar on white paper, face east to ingest it, and visualize with focused intent the Straight-Armored Jade Maiden holding the talisman before you.

**The Vermilion Talisman of the Jiaxu Plain Petition**
Write in cinnabar on white silk and wear it. On a Jiaxu day at dawn, write in cinnabar on white paper, face east to ingest it, and visualize with focused intent the Straight-Armored Jade Maiden holding the talisman before you.

**The Vermilion Talisman of the Jiayin Plain Petition**

They shall command immortal officials and acquire natural objects, but must carefully avoid the defilements of life and death. Without this writ, one may not practice the immortal Dao or rashly summon celestial perfected beings, lest one’s body perish without attaining immortality.

**The Supreme Mystic Jade Contract of the Three Primes**
Engraved within the Northern Chamber of the Numinous Capital, its celestial script of jade characters spans a foot in size. Seven hundred *zhifu* and eighty-two jade maidens bear it. After wearing this writ for a hundred days and meditating with purity upon the Three Primes, one shall naturally comprehend the celestial sounds. Without this writ, one may not rashly practice the flying immortal Dao, lest misfortune befall the seven ancestors, and one forfeit the rank of immortality.

**The Flying Celestial Contract of the Purple Tenuity Mystic Palace**
Engraved upon the Terrace of the Morning Lamp, it illuminates the Nine Heavens above. The Celestial Venerable of Primordial Beginning in the Supreme Clarity’s Upper Palace bestowed it upon the Queen Mother of the West to summon the officials of the Five Sacred Peaks and the numinous immortals of mountains and seas. With a pure heart and tranquil focus, after a hundred days one shall behold the spirits and naturally know the hidden names of the Nine Heavens. Those who wear it shall attract immortal officials. Without this writ, one may not recite the *Supreme Scripture for Dispelling Demons*, lest great misfortune befall the body. Exercise caution.

**The Flying Celestial Middle Writ for Inspecting Immortals**
Engraved upon the Three Primes’ Terrace, it was transmitted by the Venerable Lord of Myriad Beginnings to the Supreme Highest, for summoning immortals and attracting the true. The recipient must perform rites at the Five Sacred Peaks for a hundred days, meditating with purity until a three-headed spirit descends to their chamber. Without this writ, one may not rashly seek immortality on the eight solar terms, lest misfortune befall the body. Those who wear it shall attain communion with divine perfected beings and be attended by twelve jade lads, who shall transmit their recitations to be heard in the Nine Heavens. Revealing it lightly shall incur the punishment of the seven ancestors, and the Five Sacred Peaks shall dispatch demonic spirits to interrogate the sinful soul.

**The Nine Heavens’ Dragon Script of the Three Primes’ Empty Cavern Jade Contract for Flying Mystery**
Engraved upon the gates of the Three Passes of the Nine Heavens, it governs the inspection of all celestial perfected beings. Those who recite the Nine Heavens’ Supreme Scripture without possessing this writ shall be punished by the Nine Heavens’ *Censor of Deceit*. Those who wear this writ shall have the Nine Heavens’ Chancellor summon and inspect the celestial primes, commanding immortal officials. After meditating with purity for a year, they shall behold the Nine Heavens’ True King, or a nine-headed figure riding a nine-colored phoenix, descending to their form. Upon seeing this, do not fear—this is the Nine Heavens’ True King who registers the supreme perfected. Simply prostrate facing south and beseech the divine immortals, and one shall naturally receive the Nine Heavens’ scriptures. Without this writ, one may not rashly recite the *Thirty-Nine Chapters of the Great Cavern True Scripture*, lest the nine ancestors be punished and one’s body be censured by Heaven for the crime of deceit.

**The Primordial Beginning’s Empty Cavern Flying Celestial Middle Writ of the Three Primes’ Jade Contract**
The Celestial Venerable of Primordial Beginning engraved it upon the Terrace of the Golden Casement. After ten thousand kalpas, it is transmitted but once. Upon beholding this writ, the Four Ultimates shall inscribe one’s name at Eastern Florescence. After wearing it and meditating with purity for three hundred days, without diverting the gaze or allowing the mind to wander, one shall behold the Celestial Venerable of Primordial Beginning. Upon seeing the Celestial Venerable of Primordial Beginning, one’s lifespan shall extend to ten thousand years. Without this writ, one may not enter the famous mountains, traverse the Five Sacred Peaks, or practice the flying immortal Dao. The Five Sacred Peaks shall reject one, and celestial demons shall assail the body, inevitably incurring great misfortune. Before receiving it, first examine one’s virtue and integrity, then wear it to obtain supreme auspiciousness. Do not wear it lightly, lest misfortune befall. Exercise caution.

**The Supreme Perfected’s Golden Tiger Script of the Nine Heavens’ Upper Empty Cavern Hidden Writ**
The Nine Heavens’ Parents inscribed it upon the Terrace of the Phoenix’s Birth. Eight hundred *zhifu* bear it. Every nine thousand years, the Nine Heavens open once, and when they do, nine suns simultaneously illuminate the eastern sky. This writ shall then naturally manifest upon the southern window of those who have attained the Dao. If one possesses the mysterious name in the Emperor’s Register, the Four Perfected shall also descend to bestow it upon the body.

Having obtained this writ, refine the spirit through nine hundred days of concentrated meditation, and one shall behold the Nine Heavens’ Parents. Once the Nine Heavens’ Parents are seen, there shall be no more cycle of death and dissolution. To practice the myriad circuits of the Dao without this writ, invoking the ascent of celestial immortals, will inevitably incur misfortune upon the body, and one’s seven generations of ancestors shall be conscripted into servitude—furthermore, one shall not attain immortality.

The above is collated from the celestial registers and writs of the *Three Primordials Jade Registers Sutra*.

**The Highest Jade Dawn’s Commanding Demon-Subduing Banner**
Those who wear it shall govern the Central Yellow Emperor’s Demon-Spirit Great King. According to the original scripture, enter the chamber on the appointed day, face the Year-Star, recite the Central Melody, display the banner within the chamber, and place it in the center. Inscribe it in green upon yellow silk.
The above is from the *Scripture of the Subtle Melody*.

**The Supreme Numinous Flying Jade Talisman**
The yang qi and yellow essence take flight as feathered script. Wearing it for nine years, one’s face shall radiate golden light; one may vanish while sitting or standing and soar through the Great Void. In practicing the Dao of flying steps, without this talisman, one cannot ascend to the Starry Keel or transcend the Nine Mysteries. The recipient shall pledge twelve feet of yellow brocade to Heaven. On the day of ascetic practice, inscribe the talisman upon the heart, and one shall then exhale qi to form clouds and ride them in flight. Inscribe it upon nine inches of yellow silk and wear it on the left elbow; the Six Jia and Twelve Spirits, along with twelve Jade Maidens of the Numinous Flight, shall attend the body.
The above is from the *Supreme Highest Nine Ways of Returning to the Origin and Flying Feather Scripture*.

**The Yellow Emperor’s Talisman for Summoning Spirits, Attracting Perfected Ones, and Subduing Demons**
Inscribe it in vermilion upon a yellow wooden board, nine inches wide and twelve inches long. Place it in the center of the chamber. Engage in scriptural recitation and practice within the chamber for a hundred days, and one shall converse with divine beings. After two years, the chamber shall naturally generate clouds of crimson radiance. To summon Perfected Ones and Heavenly Immortals, inscribe it according to the method, face south with the talisman, and meditate with precision for a hundred days. The Perfected Ones shall descend in form, and immortals shall visit the chamber to transmit the Dao of divine perfection.
The above is from the *Scripture of Golden Perfection and Jade Radiance*.

**The Red Emperor’s Bing-Ding Numinous Communion Jade Talisman**
Inscribe it in cinnabar upon yellow silk and wear it on the body. On Bing or Ding days, inscribe it in cinnabar upon yellow paper, face south, and ingest one talisman. After three years, the Jade Maiden of the Bing-Ding Red Jade shall descend and appear; the body shall attain numinous communion, perceiving all affairs within ten thousand *li* of the southern realm. The immortal officials of the Southern Marchmount shall naturally provide traveling kitchens. After nine years, the Red Emperor shall descend to the bedchamber, welcoming the adept with a flying chariot of cinnabar radiance to ascend to the Upper Clarity Palace.
The above is from the *Scripture of the Numinous Flight of the Six Jia*.

**The Six Primordials’ Vast-Falling Morning Star Essence Talisman**
To summon the Perfected Ones and immortal officials of the Northern Marchmount, inscribe it in white upon black paper, face north, and ingest it. After a hundred days of refining demons, the immortal officials shall arrive at once, and Perfected Ones shall visit the chamber to transmit the elixir of divine immortality and converse with the adept. To subdue the demons of the Black Emperor, inscribe it in yellow upon a nine-inch black wooden board, face north for a hundred days, and the celestial demons shall be bound in form while myriad spirits shall perish of themselves. Practicing the Emperor’s Rites for seven years, one shall attain divine immortality and ascend to Heaven in broad daylight.
The above is from the *Scripture of the Seven Primordials*.

**The Jade Clarity’s Floating-Radiance Canopy of the Flowering Heavenly Mystery, the Hidden Writ of the Golden Mystery’s Inner Text**
The Three Primordials of the Grand Simplicity received it from the Celestial King of the Primordial Beginning and transmitted it to the Jade Maiden of the Great Harmony. To practice the Dao of divine immortality, inscribe it in purple upon a yellow board and place it in the northwest to extinguish the demonic officials and retinue of the Grand Demon King of the Vast Emperor. It shall summon the immortal officials of the Northwest Realm of Blessed Virtue and the World of Extending Worthies. After twelve years, the Jade Maidens of the Upper Palace shall descend to the adept’s bedchamber to transmit the Dao of divine perfection. Furthermore, inscribe it in purple upon yellow silk and wear it while traveling to the Northwest Realm of Extending Worthies; then, the myriad spirits shall gird themselves in submission, and demon kings shall bow their heads in reverence. One shall ride a flying cloud and feathered canopy to roam the Jade Clarity Palace.
The above is from the *Scripture of the Jade Clarity’s Hidden Writ*.

**The Northern Emperor’s Vast Numinous Demon-Slaying Ghost-Killing Jade Writ**
Received from the Highest Three Heavens, guarded by twenty-six Jade Maidens of the Great Mystery, it is also called the *Mighty Divine Jade Strategy*, worn by the Demon-Quelling King of Jade Clarity. To slay ghosts of Ren and Gui days, inscribe it in green upon yellow silk, twelve inches long and three inches and two *fen* wide. On Ren days, place it upon the central Wu; on Gui days, place it upon Ji. Hold the breath for twelve cycles, knock the teeth thirty-six times, and recite the incantation:
*"Heaven topples, earth surges; the four seasons seize their light. The five phases hasten their reckoning, inspecting and fixing the ten directions. The Celestial Emperor ascends his throne; the August Elder emerges from his chamber. By the command of the Highest, the sound severs without refuge. First execute the ghostly wretches, then sever the multitude of malevolence. A thousand demons, ten thousand trials—none shall not submit and descend. All shall conform to the Jade Writ. The flowing bells of the eight thoroughfares, the vast-falling stars cast in exchange, mountains and peaks collapse and crumble. Obey Heaven and follow the mandate; the Earls and Scribes shall share in the merit."*
Conclude by drawing in the breath twelve times and swallowing it. Practicing this for twelve days, the demonic kind shall be extinguished, and the multitude of malevolent spirits shall lose their essence. Inscribe it in green upon yellow silk and wear it while traveling the world; myriad ghosts shall flee of themselves, and a thousand demons shall conceal their traces. After twelve years, one shall naturally gain the service of nine Jade Maidens of the Azure Waist.
This talisman is from the *Scripture of the Jade Clarity’s Hidden Writ*.

**Here concludes the Jade Writs and Yellow Pledge Scripts of the Highest Clarity.**

Inscribe in white upon azure silk and wear it upon the body; when traveling eastward, one shall summon the Great Peace of the World of Na Shan, where the Demon King of the Six Heavens will gird his sash, bow in reverence, and offer welcome. The immortals shall attend as guards, and upon entering Mount Tai, one shall be borne aloft by a canopy of azure clouds and, after nine years, ascend to the Upper Clarity.

*Recorded in the* **Hidden Writ of Jade Clarity**.

---

### **The Talisman of the Seven Luminaries and the Star of Pacification**

To summon the Perfected and immortals of the Central Marchmount, inscribe in vermilion upon yellow paper, face the Year-Star, and wear it. Cultivate with focused intent for a hundred days, and the immortals shall arrive at once; the Perfected shall visit your chamber to bestow the elixir of transcendence and the Five Elders’ sacred writ.

To subdue the demons of the Yellow Emperor, inscribe in azure upon a nine-inch yellow wooden tablet and place it above the Year-Star. After a hundred days, the celestial demons shall bind their forms, and the myriad spirits shall perish of themselves. The **Imperial August Script**, practiced for seven years, enables flight as an immortal.

*Recorded in the* **Scripture of the Seven Luminaries**.

---

### **The Hidden Writ of the Eastern Mons**

Inscribe with orpiment upon green silk and wear it upon the body; one may then wander the land of Ahaluoti in the east, subdue the host of spirits, behead celestial demons, tame the Five Weapons, and roam the famed mountains. The Hu Elders shall come to escort and welcome, and one shall naturally comprehend the tongues of the Six States, conversing with the gods as equals.

---

### **The Inner Writ of the Southern Branch Tone**

Inscribe with orpiment upon green silk and wear it upon the body; one may then wander the land of Yishata, subdue the host of spirits, behead celestial demons, tame the Five Weapons, and roam the famed mountains. The Yue Elders’ officials shall come to escort and welcome, and one shall naturally comprehend the tongues of the Six States, conversing with the gods as equals.

---

### **The Inner Writ of the Western Primordial Azure Grotto**

Inscribe with orpiment upon green silk and wear it upon the body; one may then enter the land of Nivīlu Lüna, subdue the host of spirits, behead celestial demons, tame the Five Weapons, traverse the Dark Path, enter the Three Clarities, and roam the famed mountains. The Di Elders shall come to escort and welcome, and one shall naturally comprehend the tongues of the Six States, conversing with the gods as equals.

---

### **The Inner Writ of the Northern Ninefold Numinous Golden Tone**

Inscribe with orpiment upon green silk and wear it upon the body; one may then enter the land of Xuntaluo, subdue the host of spirits, behead celestial demons, tame the Five Weapons, ascend the Vast Cold, pay homage to the Northern Essence, and roam the famed mountains. The Qiang Elders shall come to escort and welcome, and one shall naturally comprehend the tongues of the Six States, conversing with the gods as equals.

---

### **The Hidden Register of the Primordial Embrace of Upper Clarity**

Inscribe with orpiment upon green silk and wear it upon the body; one may then ascend to the land of the Primal Essence and Azure Chaos, subdue the host of spirits, behead celestial demons, tame the Five Weapons, tread the void heavens, ascend to Jade Clarity, and roam the famed mountains. The myriad Perfected shall come to escort and welcome, and one shall naturally comprehend the tongues of the Six States, conversing with the gods as equals.

---

### **The Inner Writ of the Central Transformation and the Assembly of Perfected Multitudes**

Inscribe with orpiment upon green silk and wear it upon the body; one may then traverse the land of the Great Harmony and the Treasure of the Boundless Perfected, subdue the host of spirits, behead celestial demons, tame the Five Weapons, enter the Grotto Abyss, ascend the Dark Obscurity, sport in the Northern Primordial, pay homage to the Purple Court, and roam the famed mountains. The Five Elders shall come to escort and welcome, and one shall naturally comprehend the tongues of the Six States, conversing with the gods as equals.

---

### **The Hidden Writ of Entry into the Six Lands**

Bestowed by the Most Exalted Lord of the Azure Lads, this writ comprises one hundred and eighty-five characters. Inscribe with orpiment upon green silk and wear it upon the body; a radiant halo shall emanate from the nape, illuminating the Ten Heavens. One may command thirty-six Jade Lads and thirty-six Jade Maidens, traverse the Five Marchmounts, cross the famed mountains, enter the Six Lands, tread the sources of the rivers, and wherever one goes, the immortals and officials of the Five Directions shall come to bow in reverence, while the border guardians shall welcome and escort. One shall overawe the Six Lands, subdue the Five Weapons, and transform without limit, following one’s will. Descending chariots of flying wheels and the Purple Carriage of the Cinnabar Empyrean shall come to welcome one’s ascent to the Azure Palace of Eastern Florescence.

When wearing this writ to traverse the Six Lands, tread the Five Marchmounts, and cross the famed mountains, upon reaching a border, first knock the teeth together thirty-six times, hold the breath for thirty-six cycles, and recite the incantation:

*"The Jade Perfected wander in circles,
Cloud chariots soar on high.
This day is most auspicious,
Dragons take flight, phoenixes soar.
Arrayed in feathered regalia,
The Four Paths open wide.
The Six Hosts begin their march,
The Ten Realms come to welcome.
Immortal lads bear the banners,
Jade maidens scatter incense.
The Five Elders bow in reverence,
Winged and soaring in formation.
Sun and moon intertwine as sashes,
Divine immortals come to escort.
Traversing the myriad lands,
Circling the four directions,
The Four Waterways and Five Marchmounts
Become my bridges and beams.
By the Emperor’s decree,
Sweep away all inauspiciousness.
All divine manifestations
Shall be most propitious.
A myriad wonders arise,
The immortal’s inner cultivation flourishes.
Foreign lands grow bright and clear,
Ascending to the Jade Capital."*

Upon completion, draw in the breath and swallow thirty-six times. This is the **Great Invocation of the Most Exalted Lord’s Wandering Might**. Practicing it subdues the Six Lands, tames the myriad spirits, summons the immortals to appear, and enables transformation without limit, ascending to the Great Clarity.

*Recorded in the* **Scripture of the Foreign Lands’ Emanations**.

---

### **The Jade Talisman of the Soaring Numinous Flight**

The **Script of the Dark Immortals and Feathered Essences**, a writ of spontaneity. Wearing it for seven years enables flight through the void, ascending to the Seven Luminaries.

On the day of ascent, inscribe it upon the left palm, grasp the Azure Radiance, and take flight. Alternatively, inscribe it upon a nine-inch green silk and wear it on the left; one shall command the Six Jia and the Twelve Spirits, with twelve Jade Maidens attending on the right.

---

### **The Talisman of the Sun Essence of the First Luminary**

Inscribe in vermilion upon white paper, face the direction of the current month’s station, and wear it. Cultivate with focused intent for a hundred days, and the Perfected shall descend to your chamber to converse with you.

To subdue demonic essences, inscribe in azure upon a nine-inch yellow wooden tablet and place it above the current month’s station. The celestial demons shall vanish of themselves, and the myriad spirits shall bind their forms. The **Imperial August Script** must not be recklessly divulged; keep it secret and practice it faithfully, and after ten years, one shall fly as an immortal.

### **The Talisman of the Year-Star Essence of the Three Luminaries**

Inscribe in black upon green paper, face east, and wear it. Cultivate with focused intent for a hundred days, and the immortals shall arrive at once; the Perfected shall visit your chamber to bestow the elixir of transcendence.

To subdue the demons of the Azure Emperor, inscribe in white upon a nine-inch green wooden tablet and place it facing east for a hundred days. The celestial demons shall bind their forms, and the myriad spirits shall perish of themselves. The **Imperial August Script** must be kept secret and practiced faithfully; after seven years, one shall fly as an immortal.

chunks.original_text: 右出《七元经》。 青帝招灵致真摄魔之符 佩之八年，帝降八舆之轮，下迎兆身，白日升天。 九天之秘，信当宝密，修行其道，道无不降，仙无不成。 以黑书青板上，令广九寸，长一尺二寸，安室东面，修行诵经。 右出《金真玉光经》。 黑帝壬癸通灵玉符 黑书青缯佩身，又以壬癸日黑书青纸上，北向服一枚，三年壬癸，太玄玉女降见，兆身通灵，知北方万里之事，致北岳仙官送自然之厨，九年黑帝降於寝房，迎以黑霞飞轮，上升上清宫。 右出《灵飞六甲经》。 赤天玄黄正法除六天文 玄黄飞玄之气结成玉文，佩者与三气同真，匡制六天，检气摄魔，馘斩千凶，威御群灵，入出水火，万灾不伤。 右出《三天正法经》。 玉清单绿察宝轮法天 高上龙烟隐书金玄内文 后圣九玄金阙帝君受之於高元灵皇停景君，以传上相青童君。 当以黄书绿板上，置西南方，以灭黄帝大魔王官属，招致西南方延福乡仁静之世界黄帝仙官，九年则八帝值真王仙官降形於兆身，授兆飞仙灵药，七十四变炼化兆身。 又以黄书绿纹上佩身，行之西南延福世界，则万灵束带，魔王稽首礼迎，三元降下飞舆琼轮，迎兆登三元之房也。 玉清贝渭邪渠初默天合晖晨命隐书金玄内文 扶桑大帝受之於太霄真王。 行神仙之道，当以黄笔书苍板上，置东南，以灭昱帝大魔王官属，招致东南元福田用贤世界昱帝仙官，十五年则致玉女二十人给兆驱使，取自然灵药。 又以黄书绿纹上佩身，东南行之用贤世界，则万灵东带，魔王稽首礼迎，得乘绿云羽盖，飞行玉清宫。 北帝洞灵灭魔杀鬼玉文 受之於高上三天，卫以黄素玉女十二人，一名神灭灵策，高上玉帝君所佩。 欲杀戊己日鬼，白书青素上，长一尺二寸，广三寸二分，戊日安东方甲上，己日安乙上，闭气九息，叩左齿三十六通，祝曰： 黄中理命，制命九天，三灵应符，五老校仙，促检北帝，束送魔身，群凶冥目，不得推延，上帝所告，捕追无亲，敢有越逸，急制酆山，明如帝信，上对玉晨。 毕，引气九咽止，行之九日，鬼魔皆束形见影，受事於眼前，万魔灭种，群妖丧精，白书青缯上，佩身游行天下，万鬼伏窜，千妖匿影，不敢干犯，九年自得役使素灵玉女七人。 右符出《玉清隐经》。 上清佩符文青券诀竟 上清佩符文白券诀 太上甲乙入木九气班符 学者服其符以招其神，存其气以降其真，求削水帝之简，上名玉札之篇。 依经存思诵祝，行之九年，则能书符投山，山降云雨，书於木，削之不灭，其文转明，带符抱木，身成山林。 埋符东岳，东岳卫以仙官十二人，一十八年则能飞行上清。 轻泄此道，罚以鬼兵，殃延七祖，身没河源。 太上丙丁入火三气班符 学者服其符以招其神，存其气以降其真，削除水帝之简，上名玉札之篇，依经存思诵祝，行之九年，则能书符投林，林自生火，书符投水，水出蛟龙，投山山降云雨。 埋符南岳，仙官侍卫形身。 一十八年则能飞行玉清。 轻泄此道，殃延七祖，身没鬼官，长闭地狱，不得升仙。 太上庚辛入金七气班符 学者服其符以招其神，存其气以降其真，削除水帝之简，上名玉札之篇。 按经修念诵祝，行之九年，则能书符於石，炼石成金，书符抱石，石隐兆形。 埋符西岳，仙官降致自然神奇异物。

**The Talisman of the Azure Emperor for Summoning Spirits and Subduing Demons**

Wear this for eight years, and the Emperor shall descend in an eight-chariot procession to welcome your body, ascending to heaven in broad daylight. The secrets of the Nine Heavens must be treasured and kept confidential; cultivate its Way, and the Dao shall descend without fail, immortality shall be attained without exception. Inscribe in black upon a green tablet, nine inches in width and twelve inches in length, and place it facing east within your chamber while cultivating and reciting the scripture.

*From the* **Scripture of the Golden Perfected and Jade Radiance**.

---

**The Black Emperor’s Talisman of Ren and Gui for Communing with Spirits**

Inscribe in black upon green silk and wear it on your person. On Ren or Gui days, inscribe in black upon green paper, face north, and ingest one talisman. After three years of Ren and Gui, the Jade Maiden of the Great Mystery shall descend and appear, your body shall commune with spirits, and you shall know all affairs within ten thousand *li* of the northern direction. The immortal officials of the Northern Peak shall present the natural alchemical kitchen. After nine years, the Black Emperor shall descend to your bedchamber, welcoming you with a black mist and a flying chariot to ascend to the Supreme Clarity Palace.

*From the* **Scripture of the Six Jia of the Numinous Flight**.

---

**The Correct Method of the Red Heaven’s Mysterious Yellow for Eliminating the Texts of the Six Heavens**

The qi of the Mysterious Yellow and Flying Mystery coalesces into jade script. Those who wear it shall unite with the Three Qi in perfection, rectify the Six Heavens, restrain qi, and subdue demons, beheading a thousand evils, wielding awe over the multitude of spirits, entering and exiting water and fire without harm from the myriad calamities.

*From the* **Scripture of the Correct Methods of the Three Heavens**.

---

**The Jade Clarity’s Single Green Wheel for Inspecting Treasures**

**The Hidden Script of Golden Mystery Inscribed by the Dragon Smoke of the Supreme**

The Nine Mysteries Lord of the Golden Palace of the Later Sage received this from the Linghuang of the High Prime. It was transmitted to the Minister of the Upper Prime, the Azure Youth. Inscribe in yellow upon a green tablet and place it in the southwest to extinguish the great demon king of the Yellow Emperor and his retinue, summoning the immortal officials of the Yellow Emperor from the World of Extended Blessings in the southwest. After nine years, the Eight Emperors and the Perfected Kings of the True Worth shall manifest in your body, bestowing upon you the elixir of flying immortality, refining and transforming your body through seventy-four transmutations.

Alternatively, inscribe in yellow upon green silk and wear it on your person. Travel to the World of Extended Blessings in the southwest, and the myriad spirits shall gird themselves in submission, while the demon kings shall bow their heads in reverence. The Three Primes shall descend in flying chariots of jade wheels to welcome you into the chambers of the Three Primes.

**The Hidden Script of Golden Mystery of the Jade Clarity’s Conch River, Evil Channel, and the Dawn Mandate of the Initial Silence of the Merging Radiance of Heaven**

Received by the Great Emperor of Fusang from the Perfected King of the Great Empyrean. To practice the Way of divine transcendence, inscribe in yellow upon a dark green tablet and place it in the southeast to extinguish the great demon king of the Luminous Emperor and his retinue, summoning the immortal officials of the Luminous Emperor from the World of Worthy Fields in the southeast. After fifteen years, twenty jade maidens shall be dispatched to serve you, gathering natural spiritual medicines.

Alternatively, inscribe in yellow upon green silk and wear it on your person. Travel to the World of Worthy Fields in the southeast, and the myriad spirits shall gird themselves in the east, while the demon kings shall bow their heads in reverence. You shall ride upon a green cloud and feathered canopy, flying to the Jade Clarity Palace.

---

**The Jade Script of the Northern Emperor for Annihilating Demons and Slaying Ghosts**

Received from the Supreme Three Heavens, guarded by twelve jade maidens of yellow silk, one named *Spirit-Extinguishing Numinous Strategy*, worn by the Lord of the Supreme Jade Emperor. To slay ghosts on Wu or Ji days, inscribe in white upon green silk, twelve inches in length and three inches and two *fen* in width. On Wu days, place it upon Jia in the east; on Ji days, place it upon Yi. Hold your breath for nine exhalations, knock your left teeth thirty-six times, and recite the incantation:

*"Within the Yellow Center, the mandate is ordered;
The mandate governs the Nine Heavens.
The Three Numinous respond to the talisman,
The Five Elders verify the immortals.
Hasten the Northern Emperor to restrain
And deliver the demonic bodies.
The multitude of evils close their eyes,
Unable to delay or evade.
By the command of the Supreme Emperor,
Pursue and capture without mercy.
Should any dare to flee,
Swiftly bind them to Feng Mountain.
Bright as the Emperor’s trust,
Facing the Jade Dawn."*

Conclude by drawing in qi nine times and swallowing it. Practice this for nine days, and the demonic ghosts shall bind their forms and appear as shadows before you, submitting to your command. The myriad demons shall be extinguished at their roots, and the multitude of spirits shall lose their essence. Inscribe in white upon green silk and wear it on your person while traveling the world; the ten thousand ghosts shall flee in terror, and a thousand demons shall hide their traces, daring not to offend. After nine years, you shall naturally gain the service of seven jade maidens of pure spirit.

*This talisman is from the* **Hidden Scripture of Jade Clarity**.

---

**The Jade Token Methods of the Upper Clarity Conclude Here**

---

**The White Token Method of the Upper Clarity’s Talismans**

**The Nine Qi Talisman of Tai Shang Jia Yi Entering Wood**

Scholars ingest this talisman to summon its spirit, visualize its qi to descend its perfected essence, and seek to erase the tablets of the Water Emperor, inscribing their names upon the jade registers. In accordance with the scripture, visualize, recite, and invoke. After nine years of practice, you shall be able to inscribe talismans and cast them into mountains, causing mountains to send down clouds and rain. Inscribe upon wood, and though carved, the script shall not fade but grow ever brighter. Carry the talisman and embrace a tree, and your body shall become one with the mountain forests. Bury the talisman in the Eastern Peak, and the Eastern Peak shall guard you with twelve immortal officials. After eighteen years, you shall be able to fly to the Upper Clarity.

Recklessly divulging this Way shall incur punishment by ghostly soldiers, calamity extending to seven generations, and your body shall sink into the river’s source.

---

**The Three Qi Talisman of Tai Shang Bing Ding Entering Fire**

Scholars ingest this talisman to summon its spirit, visualize its qi to descend its perfected essence, erase the tablets of the Water Emperor, and inscribe their names upon the jade registers. In accordance with the scripture, visualize, recite, and invoke. After nine years of practice, you shall be able to inscribe talismans and cast them into forests, causing forests to spontaneously ignite; cast them into water, and water shall produce dragons; cast them into mountains, and mountains shall send down clouds and rain. Bury the talisman in the Southern Peak, and immortal officials shall attend and guard your body. After eighteen years, you shall be able to fly to the Jade Clarity.

Recklessly divulging this Way shall bring calamity upon seven generations, your body shall be consigned to the ghostly officials, and you shall be eternally confined to the earthly prisons, unable to ascend as an immortal.

---

**The Seven Qi Talisman of Tai Shang Geng Xin Entering Metal**

Scholars ingest this talisman to summon its spirit, visualize its qi to descend its perfected essence, erase the tablets of the Water Emperor, and inscribe their names upon the jade registers. In accordance with the scripture, cultivate, recite, and invoke. After nine years of practice, you shall be able to inscribe talismans upon stone, refining stone into gold; inscribe talismans and embrace stone, and the stone shall conceal your form. Bury the talisman in the Western Peak, and immortal officials shall descend to present natural and wondrous treasures.

Scholars ingest this talisman to summon its spirit, visualize its qi to descend its perfected essence. Follow the original text in cultivation, recitation, and invocation. chunks.original_text: 经云：佩之八年，三一俱见矣。 朱书素，佩之左肘。 青童君授涓子以封名山。 右此出《四宫雌一真经》。 金虎真符 金虎真符以制天地神灵，便得摧斩千精，而降伏万鬼，佩之而进，得以朝玉皇，礼之於寝，则众真诣其房。 佩此符者，威制天地，呵叱群灵，控景驾龙，位司高仙。 琼音既震，则玉华侍侧，金真卫兵，千妖丧眸，万鬼灭形。 右出《太上八卫隐文经》。 大劫度厄保命长存符 元始九玄之精，经大阳九之会，洪水滔天。 当以青书白绢，佩之头上，浮翔清波之上，万灾不能伤，保身长存，久佩神仙。 小劫度厄保命长存符 九天太真符，经小阳九之周，水灾交横，万灾并兴。 当以朱书白绢，佩之左肘，入渊不沉，入火不然，万灾不能害，保身长命，与天同寿，久佩神仙。 大百六度厄保命长存符 上皇玉天符，经大百六之厄，朱书白绢，佩之头上，流灾暴厄所不能伤，保身长命，寿同三光。 佩之九年，白日飞仙，上升太清。 小百六度厄保命长存符 高上紫虚玉符，经小百六之厄，黄书白绢，佩之左肘，千妖万精，疫疠横流，灾所不能伤，保身长命，寿同天地。 佩之九年，白日飞升。 阴阳度厄保命长存符 三天童子玉符，经天地改度，万疠交横，水火兵病，千灾并行，黑书白绢，佩之与天同年，与日同光，九年飞行，上升太清。 右此上五符，并出《紫书上经》。 黄帝戊己通灵玉符 黄书白缯佩身，又以戊己日黄书白纸，向太岁服一枚，三年戊己黄素玉女降见，兆身通灵，知中央万里之事，致中岳仙官送自然之厨。 九年黄帝降於寝房，迎以黄霞飞轮，上升上清宫。 甲子素奏丹符 朱书白缯佩之，以甲子日平旦，朱书白纸，东向服之，愿祝悉目存直甲玉女执符在前。 甲午素奏丹符 朱书白缯佩之，甲午日平旦，朱书白纸，东向服之，愿祝悉目存直甲玉女执符在前。 甲辰素奏丹符 朱书白缯佩之，甲辰日平旦，朱书白纸，东向服之，愿祝悉目存直甲玉女执符在前。 甲戌素奏丹符 朱书白缯佩之，甲戌日平旦，朱书白纸，东向服之，愿祝悉目存直甲玉女执符在前。 甲寅素奏丹符 朱书白缯佩之，甲寅日平旦，朱书白纸，东向服之，愿祝悉目存直甲玉女执符在前。 甲申素奏丹符 朱书白缯佩之，甲申日平旦，朱书白纸，东向服之，愿祝悉目存直甲玉女执符在前。 丹书符文，依甲子日醮受而佩身，命神召灵，摄海封山，游行五岳，万神敬迎，役使六甲，上天入渊，分形散影，七十四方，所愿立得，所向立成。 修之九年，降致三元，乘空飞行，上造琼宫。 右出《灵飞六甲经》。 高上玉晨命魔灵旛 佩之主制西方白帝灵魔大王。 依法日入室，诵西方曲施旛，於室内安西方，朱书白缯。 玄丘太真书隐文 召群灵，制万精，佩之九年，得见三元君，迎圣君於上清金阙。 朱书白缯。 右出《曲素上经》。 四元豁落太白星精符 欲致西岳真人仙官，以黄书白纸，西向服之，精思百日，仙官立到，真人诣房，赐兆真书，与兆共言。 欲制白帝之魔，以朱书白木九寸版上，向西面百日，天魔束形，万精自丧。 帝皇之章，行之七年，神仙度世，白日升天。 右出《七元经》。 白帝招灵致真摄魔之符 佩之八年，帝降玄景绿舆，下迎兆身，上升太清。 九天秘信，兆当宝密，修行其道，道无不降，仙无不成。

chunks.original_text: 以黄书白板上，令广九寸，长一尺二寸，安室西面，修行诵经。 右出《金真玉光经》。 三天真书 佩者入水，蛟龙开道万里，大劫交则能腾身玄虚，奉翊圣尊於上清宫。 右出《三天正法经》。 下灵飞玉符 元始之精，羽玄玉章，佩之九年，乘空飞行，上登五星，飞步升玄之道气，无此符则不得乘空而行也。 受者素锦六十尺盟誓，登修之日，书右手掌中，即能握素灵飞行。 丹书白素九寸佩之，左统六甲十二神，玉女十二人侍右。 右出《太上回元九道飞行羽经》。 玉清高挑厉冲龙罗天观灵元晨隐书金玄内文 九老仙都所佩。 行神仙之道，当以赤书白板上，置西方，以灭西方白帝大魔王官属，招致西方仙官。 行之十二年，仙官景素灵七圣金灵君降形兆身，役使仙官取自然灵药。 又以朱书白缯佩身，行来西方福堂洲盛行之世界，大魔王束带稽首礼迎，仙官侍卫入西岳，则致素云羽盖，十二年飞行玉清宫。 右出《玉清隐书经》。 北帝寒灵灭魔杀鬼玉文 受之於高上三天，卫以玉女三十六人，一名九天命魔文，高上神霄王所佩之。 欲杀甲乙日鬼，朱书文白素上，长一尺二寸，广三寸二分，甲日置西方庚上，乙日辛上，闭气七息，叩齿三十六通，祝曰： 乘天履气，奉行威章，高上玉文，普摄万凶，寒灵受制，声如天钟，明告伯史，检制北酆，先戮鬼爽，后剪魔王，大小灭踪，高下摧崩，如天之命，绝气火宫，太一监诏，五老役翁，天清地朗，万津开通，甲乙所执，靡不敬从。 毕，引气七咽止。 行之七日，天魔束形见景，受事於眼前，鬼爽灭种，万精自亡。 朱书白素佩身，可游行天下，群妖不试，万鬼不敢干也。 七年自得役使太丹玉女八人。 右出《上清神慧隐书》。 金阙之内有隐书玉名 玉字十，赤书。 佩之者则金阙刻玉简，注仙名，四渎五岳灵仙营卫送迎。 知者飞升金阙，腾景上清。 上清金书玉箓上文 玉字十，青书。 佩之者则上清刻书金简，注名神仙，告下五岳，仙官扶迎。 知者飞升上清，位齐四真。 太极白简文 玉字十，青书。 佩之者太极刻名，书於简文，注於神府，四极营卫。 知者飞升太极宫，腾景金阙之中。 方诸玄素紫名隐文 玉字十，青书。 佩之者方诸刻书玄紫青名，九年飞行，神仙卫迎，五岳记名，知者飞升方诸宫。 太清玉籍绛名隐文 玉字十，赤书。 佩之者太清刻书绛名於玉籍，九年通神飞行，给玉童十二人，知者飞升太清，腾景琼宫。 太素琼简金名隐文 玉字十，黄书。 佩之者太素刻书琼简，九年致飞云白日升天，知者飞升太素之宫，上朝三元君。 南极有丹文紫箓上文 玉字十，赤书。 佩之者则南极注名於紫箓，九年三元下降，授子真书，白日升天。 知者白日飞升，上谒太极元君。 玄宫上元青金赤书隐文 玉字十，青书。 佩之者目见上元真形，九年降兆之房，授兆真书，即得神仙。 知者飞升玄官，腾景上清。 玄都丹台白玉金字隐文 玉字十，黄书。 佩之者刻书丹台之名，九年乘空景而行，久久神仙，知者白日飞升玄都。 三元宫琳札青书隐文 玉字十，青书。 佩之者刻名於琼琳之札，九年三元诣房授兆真文，神仙飞行。 知者白日升天，上拜三元君。 玄斗之中玄名录籍隐文 玉字十，黑书。 佩之者刻书玄斗之名，九年神人下降，授兆真书，行之神仙。

To practice the myriad circuits of the Dao without this writ, invoking the ascent of celestial immortals, will inevitably incur misfortune upon the body, and one’s seven generations of ancestors shall be conscripted into servitude—furthermore, one shall not attain immortality.

The above is collated from the celestial registers and writs of the *Three Primordials Jade Registers Sutra*.

**The Highest Jade Dawn’s Commanding Demon-Subduing Banner**
Those who wear it shall govern the Central Yellow Emperor’s Demon-Spirit Great King. According to the original scripture, enter the chamber on the appointed day, face the Year-Star, recite the Central Melody, display the banner within the chamber, and place it in the center. Inscribe it in green upon yellow silk.
The above is from the *Scripture of the Subtle Melody*.

**The Supreme Numinous Flying Jade Talisman**
The yang qi and yellow essence take flight as feathered script. Wearing it for nine years, one’s face shall radiate golden light; one may vanish while sitting or standing and soar through the Great Void. In practicing the Dao of flying steps, without this talisman, one cannot ascend to the Starry Keel or transcend the Nine Mysteries. The recipient shall pledge twelve feet of yellow brocade to Heaven. On the day of ascetic practice, inscribe the talisman upon the heart, and one shall then exhale qi to form clouds and ride them in flight. Inscribe it upon nine inches of yellow silk and wear it on the left elbow; the Six Jia and Twelve Spirits, along with twelve Jade Maidens of the Numinous Flight, shall attend the body.
The above is from the *Supreme Highest Nine Ways of Returning to the Origin and Flying Feather Scripture*.

**The Yellow Emperor’s Talisman for Summoning Spirits, Attracting Perfected Ones, and Subduing Demons**
Inscribe it in vermilion upon a yellow wooden board, nine inches wide and twelve inches long. Place it in the center of the chamber. Engage in scriptural recitation and practice within the chamber for a hundred days, and one shall converse with divine beings. After two years, the chamber shall naturally generate clouds of crimson radiance. To summon Perfected Ones and Heavenly Immortals, inscribe it according to the method, face south with the talisman, and meditate with precision for a hundred days. The Perfected Ones shall descend in form, and immortals shall visit the chamber to transmit the Dao of divine perfection.
The above is from the *Scripture of Golden Perfection and Jade Radiance*.

**The Red Emperor’s Bing-Ding Numinous Communion Jade Talisman**
Inscribe it in cinnabar upon yellow silk and wear it on the body. On Bing or Ding days, inscribe it in cinnabar upon yellow paper, face south, and ingest one talisman. After three years, the Jade Maiden of the Bing-Ding Red Jade shall descend and appear; the body shall attain numinous communion, perceiving all affairs within ten thousand *li* of the southern realm. The immortal officials of the Southern Marchmount shall naturally provide traveling kitchens. After nine years, the Red Emperor shall descend to the bedchamber, welcoming the adept with a flying chariot of cinnabar radiance to ascend to the Upper Clarity Palace.
The above is from the *Scripture of the Numinous Flight of the Six Jia*.

**The Six Primordials’ Vast-Falling Morning Star Essence Talisman**
To summon the Perfected Ones and immortal officials of the Northern Marchmount, inscribe it in white upon black paper, face north, and ingest it. After a hundred days of refining demons, the immortal officials shall arrive at once, and Perfected Ones shall visit the chamber to transmit the elixir of divine immortality and converse with the adept. To subdue the demons of the Black Emperor, inscribe it in yellow upon a nine-inch black wooden board, face north for a hundred days, and the celestial demons shall be bound in form while myriad spirits shall perish of themselves. Practicing the Emperor’s Rites for seven years, one shall attain divine immortality and ascend to Heaven in broad daylight.
The above is from the *Scripture of the Seven Primordials*.

**The Jade Clarity’s Floating-Radiance Canopy of the Flowering Heavenly Mystery, the Hidden Writ of the Golden Mystery’s Inner Text**
The Three Primordials of the Grand Simplicity received it from the Celestial King of the Primordial Beginning and transmitted it to the Jade Maiden of the Great Harmony. To practice the Dao of divine immortality, inscribe it in purple upon a yellow board and place it in the northwest to extinguish the demonic officials and retinue of the Grand Demon King of the Vast Emperor. It shall summon the immortal officials of the Northwest Realm of Blessed Virtue and the World of Extending Worthies. After twelve years, the Jade Maidens of the Upper Palace shall descend to the adept’s bedchamber to transmit the Dao of divine perfection. Furthermore, inscribe it in purple upon yellow silk and wear it while traveling to the Northwest Realm of Extending Worthies; then, the myriad spirits shall gird themselves in submission, and demon kings shall bow their heads in reverence. One shall ride a flying cloud and feathered canopy to roam the Jade Clarity Palace.
The above is from the *Scripture of the Jade Clarity’s Hidden Writ*.

**The Northern Emperor’s Vast Numinous Demon-Slaying Ghost-Killing Jade Writ**
Received from the Highest Three Heavens, guarded by twenty-six Jade Maidens of the Great Mystery, it is also called the *Mighty Divine Jade Strategy*, worn by the Demon-Quelling King of Jade Clarity. To slay ghosts of Ren and Gui days, inscribe it in green upon yellow silk, twelve inches long and three inches and two *fen* wide. On Ren days, place it upon the central Wu; on Gui days, place it upon Ji. Hold the breath for twelve cycles, knock the teeth thirty-six times, and recite the incantation:
*"Heaven topples, earth surges; the four seasons seize their light. The five phases hasten their reckoning, inspecting and fixing the ten directions. The Celestial Emperor ascends his throne; the August Elder emerges from his chamber. By the command of the Highest, the sound severs without refuge. First execute the ghostly wretches, then sever the multitude of malevolence. A thousand demons, ten thousand trials—none shall not submit and descend. All shall conform to the Jade Writ. The flowing bells of the eight thoroughfares, the vast-falling stars cast in exchange, mountains and peaks collapse and crumble. Obey Heaven and follow the mandate; the Earls and Scribes shall share in the merit."*
Conclude by drawing in the breath twelve times and swallowing it. Practicing this for twelve days, the demonic kind shall be extinguished, and the multitude of malevolent spirits shall lose their essence. Inscribe it in green upon yellow silk and wear it while traveling the world; myriad ghosts shall flee of themselves, and a thousand demons shall conceal their traces. After twelve years, one shall naturally gain the service of nine Jade Maidens of the Azure Waist.
This talisman is from the *Scripture of the Jade Clarity’s Hidden Writ*.

**Here concludes the Jade Writs and Yellow Pledge Scripts of the Highest Clarity.**
